name: Aero Box
description:
My entry for GMTK Jam. It's a simple arcade game where you try to touch the blocks and earn points by jumping. But since it destroys the block you can't stand on it. If you fall, you die! I tried to make the mechanics revolve around jumping. Hope you like it!

Source code: https://github.com/AliYil/gmtkjam-aero/
